markdownContent: â€¦ alright. Apparently you've been just applied for an internship and accepted? On the one hand: great timing, this could really be an opportunity to get some ideas. On the other hand, being somewhat pressured into doing this feels a little weird. I mean sure it's Shorter and sure you have not much else planned for the summer than lying around in the sun, but still. After googling the museum you find out that the direktor is a certain Laura Brobdingnagian and conveniently there's one collection, which sounds interesting...
